channel.title: Achievement Tab help [PI]
channel.description: Hi guys, I'm making an achievement tab from scratch and I was wondering how to "check player stats" before using it. like say if the achievement was all 99s and a player hasent got that but he clicks on the achievement. it will not give him the reward. I want that plus how do you do it so it only works once?

item.title: Achievement Tab help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DonWorld DonWorld
item.description:
@DonWorld wrote:

Hi guys, I’m making an achievement tab from scratch and I was wondering how to “check player stats” before using it. like say if the achievement was all 99s and a player hasent got that but he clicks on the achievement. it will not give him the reward. I want that plus how do you do it so it only works once?

Read full topic
